summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2019, to April 30, 2019. It details the beginning and ending balances, as well as various transactions including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges. The document also includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
